cast.name: Vino G. Bastian Vino G. Bastian

this_title: Warkop DKI Reborn: Jangkrik Boss Part 2
trans_title: 沃科普·德吉的重生：西卡达老板2
introduction: Jangkrik Boss Part 2, picks up on the adventure of Dono (Abimana Aryasatya), Kasino (Vino G Bastian) and Indro (Tora Sudiro) in searching for the treasure to pay their debts, so they could avoid prison. The neighboring country, Malaysia, is their first destination at the start of this film. The bag with the codes to the treasure which gets mistakenly switched with one belonging to a pretty Malaysian woman, Nadia (Fazura), leads them to all sorts of unimaginable places, concluding at a haunted uninhabited island. On the island, they are forced to split up and face scary yet hilarious ghosts. Funny events and occurrences that will break up the laughter continue to follow their antics, where twists upon unexpected twists will be revealed in this excitingly wacky Treasure Hunt sequel called Warkop DKI Reborn : Jangkrik Boss Part 2. Can't wait? Coming soon, Warkop DKI Reborn: Jangkrik Boss Part 2, in all cinemas across Indonesia, August 31st 2017. Also featuring Indro Warkop, Hanna Al ...
chinese_title: 沃科普·德吉的重生：西卡达老板2
foreign_title: Warkop DKI Reborn: Jangkrik Boss Part 2
